279 
 
  
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
MAKURDI   
YABATECH   
MAUTY      
  
  
STATISTICS/COMPUTER SCIENCE  
EDUCATION  
MAKURDI  
  
  
MATHEMATICS /COMPUTER SCIENCE  
EDUCATION  
MAKURDI      
    
   (xxiv) KSU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passesin English 
Language, Mathematics and three (3) other Sciences  
subjects from Biology, Physics, Chemistry, 
Agricultural Science, and Economics.  
(xxiii) AAUA requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes which 
must include English Language, Mathematics, 
Biology, Chemistry and one (1) other subject.  
(xxiv) FED-DUTSINMA requires five (5) 'O’ level credit 
passes including: English Language, Mathematics, 
Physics and any other two (2) from Chemistry, 
Biology, Economics or Geography.  
(xxv) MINNA requires English Language, Mathematics,  
 Chemistry,  Physics  and  any  other  from  
Biology/Agricultural Science or Geography  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) DELSU and EDALV require Mathematics and two (2) 
other subjects.  
(ii) LAPAI accepts Geography/Physics as one (1) of the 
UTME subjects and one (1)Science/Social Sciences 
subjects.  
(iii) EDASAB  and  BENIN  require  Physics  and  
anyotherScience/Social Sciences subjects as the other 
two (2) subjects.   
(iv) IMSU requires Physics and any one (1) of Chemistry, 
Economics, and Geography as the UTME subjects.  
(v) CRUTECH requires Physics and either Biology or 
Chemistry.  
(vi) TASUED does not accept AgriculturalScience as a 
Science subject.  
(vii) LAGOS requires Mathematics, Physics and any one (1) 
of Chemistry, Biology.  
(viii) IAUED – Same as in Computer Education.  
(ix) MAKURDI requires Mathematics, Biology and Physics.  
(x) MAUTY accepts Agricultural Science In lieu of Biology.  
(xi) AAUA requires Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry
